results.t: Beryllium - Element information, properties and uses | Periodic ...

results.p: Beryllium is a chemical element; it has symbol Be and atomic number 4. It is a steel-gray, hard, strong, lightweight and brittle alkaline earth metal.
Beryllium is a chemical element with symbol Be and atomic number 4. Classified as an alkaline earth metal, Beryllium is a solid at room temperature.

Aug 29, 2024 — Beryllium is a steel-gray metal that is quite brittle at room temperature, and its chemical properties somewhat resemble those of aluminum.
